pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.1.8: That is, a fracture of two finger-breaths, dvaṅgulā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.2.49: The Pali seems to be missing ellipses points after pācittiyaṁ. Otherwise the two four-item series beginning with dvibandhanokāsena and tibandhanokāsena are not accounted for.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:2.2.59: Again, the Pali seems to be missing ellipses points after pācittiyaṁ. Otherwise the two four-item series beginning with dvibandhanokāsena and tibandhanokāsena are not accounted for.
